Articles.Content: When do I unlock the ability to do EVA to transfer science from parts to my pods? What is it called in the game, is it the EVA outside Kerbin or something else?
EVA when not on Kerbin surface is unlocked by upgrading the astronaut complex.

You need to upgrade the Astronaut Complex to the second tier.

Surface samples also requires the second tier R&D.
I *think* it is the Astronaut Complex, but am not sure. Right-click any facility, the hover the mouse pointer over the upgrade button: this will tell you what the next update brings.
So transferring science from one part to the pod, is part of the EVA unlock?

> 
> So transferring science from one part to the pod, is part of the EVA unlock?

 Correct.
I figured it was part of the R&D upgrade -Resource Transfer Available.
I believe resource transfer is fuel. Could be ore? I know you need to unlock it to pump fuel around your ship though.
resource transfer includes all resources, such as fuel, monopropellant, electric charge, intake air, and yes, ore (if you want to move it between different tanks).
Thanks guys! I wish there was a png or manual or wiki that showed and explain some of the unlocks better.
